H0.text: who invented the chip in . debit cards. Roland Moreno

H1.text: who invented the chip in . debit cards. Jacques Vallée

H2.text: who invented the chip in . debit cards. Marc Hedlund

H3.text: who invented the chip in . debit cards. Helmut Gröttrup

A4.text: Helmut Gröttrup invented the smart card as a forgery‑proof key for secure identification and access control.

A5.text: In February 1967, Gröttrup introduced the idea of incorporating an integrated circuit chip onto a plastic carrier and filed the patent DE1574074 for a tamper‑proof identification switch based on a semiconductor device.
